alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lamar; Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 9:45AM CST until March 03 at 10:45AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CST FOR MARION...WESTERN FAYETTE AND LAMAR COUNTIES... At 944 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Tishomingo State Park to near Columbus AFB, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Winfield, Fayette, Vernon, Sulligent, Millport, Guin, Hackleburg, Brilliant, Glen Allen, Kennedy, Detroit, Belk, Beaverton, Gu-Win, Bluff, Blooming Grove, Brinn, Lake Buttahatchee and Weston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for northwestern and west central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
